statements: UPDATE camera_footage SET footage_url = 'http://example.com/1' WHERE camera_id = 1;
UPDATE camera_footage SET timestamp = '2022-01-01T12:00:00Z', footage_url = 'http://example.com/2' WHERE camera_id = 2;
UPDATE camera_footage SET footage_url = 'new_url' WHERE timestamp = '2022-09-15 13:30:00' AND camera_id = 1
UPDATE camera_footage SET timestamp = '2022-09-20 10:00:00', footage_url = 'updated_url' WHERE camera_id = 2
UPDATE security_camera_footage SET footage = 'New Footage Data', timestamp = '2022-08-15 08:30:00' WHERE camera_id = 1;
UPDATE smart_lighting_automation SET lighting_mode = 'Night Mode', timestamp = '2022-08-15 18:45:00' WHERE lighting_id = 2;
UPDATE security_camera_footage SET footage = 'New footage data' WHERE camera_id = 1 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01'
UPDATE smart_lighting_automation SET lighting_mode = 'Night mode' WHERE timestamp < NOW() AND lighting_id = 2
UPDATE security_camera_logging SET event_type = 'Motion Detection' WHERE camera_id = 1 AND timestamp = '2022-01-15 10:30:00';
UPDATE surveillance_control SET scenario = 'Night Surveillance' WHERE control_id = 3;
UPDATE security_camera_logging SET event_type = 'motion' WHERE camera_id = 123 AND timestamp = '2022-11-30 08:00:00';
UPDATE surveillance_control SET timestamp = '2023-01-15 12:30:00', scenario = 'new scenario' WHERE control_id = 456;
UPDATE security_camera_footage SET footage_url = 'http://example.com/footage1.mp4' WHERE camera_id = 1;
UPDATE synchronization_schedule SET status = 'Paused' WHERE schedule_id = 5;
UPDATE security_camera_footage SET footage_url = 'http://new-footage-url.com' WHERE camera_id = 1
UPDATE lighting_automation SET lighting_action = 'turn_off' WHERE automation_id = 2
UPDATE security_camera_footage SET footage_url='http://example.com/footage1.mp4' WHERE footage_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE lighting_automation SET light_control=true, automation_schedule='2022-07-15 08:30:00' WHERE automation_id='223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE security_camera_footage SET camera_id = 'camera_123' WHERE footage_id = 'f1234';
UPDATE lighting_automation SET light_control = TRUE, automation_name = 'Evening Lights' WHERE automation_id = 'a4321';
